devdoc.author: Radiant
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

borrow(address,uint256,uint256,uint16).details: Loop the deposit and borrow of an asset

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

quoteLayerZeroSwapFee(uint16,uint8,bytes.details: Call Router.sol method to get the value for swap()

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Borrow gate via stargate

DAOTreasuryUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when DAO address is updated

PoolIDsUpdated(address[],uint256[]).notice: Emited when pool ids of assets are updated

XChainBorrowFeePercentUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when fee info is updated

getXChainBorrowFeeAmount(uint256).notice: Get Cross Chain Borrow Fee amount.

poolIdPerChain(address).notice: asset => poolId; at the moment, pool IDs for USDC and USDT are the same accross all chains

setXChainBorrowFeePercent(uint256).notice: Set Cross Chain Borrow Fee Percent.
